Sentencas: Apart from natural gas there is another important natural source of methane.
Titulo: Development of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell for the utilization of coal mine gas

Sentencas: The so-called coal mine gas is a by-product of the geochemical process of the carbonization of sediments from marsh woods of the Earth's Carboniferous Period.
Titulo: Development of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell for the utilization of coal mine gas

Sentencas: Methane evaporates from the coal and has to be removed out of the active mines where it represents one of the main safety risks.
Titulo: Development of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell for the utilization of coal mine gas

Sentencas: Methane also evaporates in abandoned coal mines.
Titulo: Development of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell for the utilization of coal mine gas

Sentencas: In the federal state Saarland in Germany exists above ground a more than 110 km pipeline for the drained coal mine gas from 12 different sources.
Titulo: Development of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell for the utilization of coal mine gas

Sentencas: The content of methane varies between 25 and 90%, the oxygen content (from air) is in the range up to 10%.
Titulo: Development of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell for the utilization of coal mine gas

Sentencas: This wide range or variation, respectively, of fuel and oxygen content, causes a lot of problems for the use in conventional engines.
Titulo: Development of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell for the utilization of coal mine gas

Sentencas: Therefore the company Evonik New Energies GmbH is interested in using SOFC with coal mine gas as efficient as possible to produce electric power.
Titulo: Development of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell for the utilization of coal mine gas

Sentencas: For that purpose at Forschungszentrum Julich the available SOFC technology was adapted to the use with coal mine gas and a test facility was designed to operate an SOFC stack (approximately 2 kW electrical power output) together with a pre-reformer.
Titulo: Development of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell for the utilization of coal mine gas

Sentencas: This paper presents the results of the coal mine gas analysis and the effect on the pre-reformer and the fuel cell.
Titulo: Development of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell for the utilization of coal mine gas

Sentencas: The composition of the coal mine gas was determined by means of micro-gas chromatography.
Titulo: Development of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell for the utilization of coal mine gas

Sentencas: The results obtained from preliminary tests using synthetic and real coal mine gas on the pre-reformer and on the fuel cell are discussed.
Titulo: Development of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell for the utilization of coal mine gas
